name: Quill Spray
prereq: Quillcoat Shisk Heritage Or Quill Unarmed Attack
summary: You can launch a mass of quills at opponents.
description:
You can launch a mass of quills at opponents. You spray quills in a 30-foot cone, dealing 5d8 piercing damage. Each creature in the area must attempt a basic saving throw against the higher of your class DC or spell DC. On a critical failure, a creature also takes 5 persistent bleed damage. At 11th level and every even level thereafter, the piercing damage increases by 1d8 and the persistent bleed damage increases by 1.Traits

Shisk: Secretive humanoids covered in bony plumage that reside underground.
